titleStmt.title: Certaine orders meete to be observed vpon any foraine invasion, for those shires that lye upon the sea coastes. With a direction to the justices of the peace.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.C. for Michael Sparke, Senior, and are to be sold at the signe of the blue Bible in Greene-Arbor,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
